title: Xtreme Gym App
technologies: Node.js | NestJS | MongoDB | Stripe | Google OAuth | ChatGPT API | WebSockets
description: Created an admin and client portal for managing profiles, workout plans, meal plan subscriptions, charts, statuses, a chat application, and AI-generated workout and meal plans. Integrated APIs for ChatGPT, Stripe, Calendly, Google OAuth, and FCM for web-based notifications while developing the backend for the web application.

title: NCS-Railway
description: Industrial project currently being used by Railways (Regrettably, I'm unable to provide the code due to our company's policies). Automated ticketing and management system for trains, coaches, seats, quota, timing, fare, and report management.

title: JS Wall
description: A banking sector project currently being used by JS Bank, featuring various modules designed specifically for security purposes for each employee.

title: Organization Health Solutions
description: An industrial project with live surveys for company individuals, offering three types of surveys: start, mid, and end, and gathering feedback and reviews. Labels and inputs are dynamically handled across multiple forms in the surveys.

title: CMS - Invoice Management System
description: Developed a comprehensive system for managing projects, timelines, clients, employees, invoicing, billing, assets, leave, health insurance, and attendance.

title: HLP - Hotel Management System
description: Developed the backend for HLP (Hotel Management System). Managed resources, expenses, and budgeting, and provided a comparison feature for hotels.

title: J-ACE
description: A banking system for JS Bank to deliver remittances to beneficiaries. Developed backend APIs in Node.js with TypeScript and integrated third-party APIs for transaction processing.

title: WhatsApp Chat Bots
description: Developed WhatsApp chatbots for Punjab Excise and Taxation, Gulberg Housing Society, Islamabad International Airport, and customer support automation for vending machines.

title: EU-Studio
description: Developed a music player backend similar to Spotify, featuring authentication, playlists, albums, categories, premium accounts, and room creation.

title: HEC Attestation
description: Developed an online platform for degree attestation starting from universities' POC to HEC administration, utilizing blockchain for data security.

title: Rahper - Ride Sharing App
technologies: Node.js | Express | WebSockets | Google Maps API
description: Developed the backend for Rahper, a ride-sharing app with real-time requests, chat, and Google Maps integration for location services.

title: Farmkar App/Admin Portal
description: Developed a project for rural areas, connecting farmers, lenders, and customers for equipment import, export, and related services.

title: Autocar
description: Developed a website and app for listing automobile parts, with an admin portal for management and cash flow tracking.

title: MeeramTech
description: Developed an app and web portal for a Huawei Authorized Service Centre.

title: MSAFA (E-commerce store for Canada)
description: Developed a complete e-commerce website with an admin portal, integrated payment APIs such as Stripe.

title: CDA-Survey Portal
description: It's a surveyor app where inspectors conduct surveys, report violations, and then proper actions are taken.
